sentences.en: Agricultural production of wheat, corn, and millet production, persimmon.
sentences.cn: 农业主产小麦 、 玉米, 兼产谷子 、 柿子.

sentences.en: Agricultural production of wheat, cotton, rich persimmon, apple, apricot Baishui specialty Zhuo.
sentences.cn: 农业主产小麦 、 棉花, 盛产柿子 、 苹果, 特产李卓白水杏.

sentences.en: Dried persimmon, however, can be consumed for six months if kept away from sunshine and damp.
sentences.cn: 新鲜柿子可以做成柿饼，在阴凉干燥的环境下，可以保存六个月。

sentences.en: Fruit to apple, pear and persimmon security for the bulk.
sentences.cn: 果品以苹果 、 安梨柿子为大宗.

sentences.en: He recalled his boots , polished till they shone, as if with the best wild persimmon juice.
sentences.cn: 他记起那黄而发沉的戒指, 说不分明那将值多少钱,一点不明白那宝贝为什么如此可爱.

sentences.en: How calm. The persimmon orchard. Under the wintry moon.
sentences.cn: 万籁何寂然, 柿子园头犹烂漫, 凄清冬月寒.

sentences.en: However, the most well - known to the large number of persimmon disc.
sentences.cn: 但最有名气的要数大磨盘柿.

sentences.en: I stood under the persimmon tree, looking at the lone little persimmon.
sentences.cn: 我仍旧站在那棵柿子树下, 望着树梢上那个孤零零的小火柿子.

sentences.en: Look at that little persimmon orchard in the west valley.
sentences.cn: 你瞧,西面山涯里那一片柿树,红得多么好看.

sentences.en: One of the best quality Dahongpao persimmon, renowned at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 其中大红袍柿子品质最佳, 驰名中外.

sentences.en: Outside, a flock of white birds dip over gray-tiled rooftops and persimmon trees.
sentences.cn: 窗外，一群白色的鸽子停在灰色的屋瓦上，点缀在柿子树丛里。

sentences.en: Persimmon is small and red, and the taste is sweet.
sentences.cn: 柿子很小且呈红色, 味道则是甜的.

sentences.en: Products: potato white gourd, Chinese cabbage, persimmon, tomato, towel gourd, soybean.
sentences.cn: 主要产品: 马铃薯、瓜 、 白菜 、 方柿、椒 、 红柿 、 瓜 、 豆.

sentences.en: Products: Sweet potato, white gourd, Chinese cabbage, persimmon, tomato, towel gourd, soybean.
sentences.cn: 主要产品: 马铃薯 、 冬瓜 、 大白菜 、 小方柿、甜椒 、 西红柿 、 丝瓜 、 大豆.

sentences.en: Red cloth plain white cloth, calico wraps date plum persimmon.
sentences.cn: 红布包白布, 白布包黑枣.

sentences.en: There are vegetables under the arched shed , mainly persimmon and Chinese cabbage.
sentences.cn: 拱棚下面罩着的是蔬菜, 主要有柿子和油菜.

trans.tran_en: a soft orange-coloured fruit that grows in hot countries
